\E8＊ ママ！　へいきだって^1！
　 やけどなんて　しないよ！/
obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_158_0:
\E3＊ うん^1。じゃあ
　 また　よるにね！/%
obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_167_0:

obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_194_0:

obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_233_0:

obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_234_0:

obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_235_0:

obj_ch4_PDC10_slash_Step_0_gml_360_0:
